meanings.definition: A person who gives individual, specialized instruction.
meanings.sent1: My tutors help me understand difficult subjects.
meanings.sent2: The tutors at the learning center are very knowledgeable.
meanings.sent3: The tutors made learning math feel like a fun puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The tutors were like guiding stars, leading me through the academic challenges.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the patient guidance of my tutors.

meanings.definition: To act as a tutor; teach or instruct.
meanings.sent1: She tutors students in math after school.
meanings.sent2: He tutors his classmates in history during study sessions.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to tutors the kittens on how to catch a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for teaching shines through as she tutors young learners.
meanings.sent5: The wise old owl tutors the young birds on how to fly gracefully.
